mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 19 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 19 1862. Sir, Please state first how many new regiments you have commenced under the Presidents last call for volunteers. Second how many of these are full. Third how many men are required to fill balance & how long will require to raise them. Fourth how many regiments [page 2] have gone to the field please answer by twelve tomorrow CP Buckingham Brig Genl & AAG 57B238pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
